title: Why
body: this forum suck? it keeps saying I need to be a level higher each time to post. It's like trying to say you can't post till you're max level.

replies.body: The forum is bearing the burden of thousands of thoughts and concerns, give it some slack.  :P  Your account has to sync to the boards when posting for the first time, and your post here should have done that.  Some areas of the boards also require a level higher than 5 as well, but commenting should tell you the requirement.  Let me know if this is still an issue, though.
Well it's dumb :P Shouldn't have a "requirement"
